info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Imran's place was filled with great hospitality. He accompanied me for grocery shopping on the first day and constantly made sure that I was not hungry and everything was ok. Boasting a convenience location, all the attractions in Old Dhaka are within walking distance not having to worry about traffic jam. His fluency in English also helped me navigate through Dhaka on my first visit. Thank you!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: after experiencing some complications during check-in, my stay turned out to be great! even though i wasn’t expected, imran was very dedicated to making my stay great. he thought about every little thing, provided me with drinking water and even some food as soon as i arrived! i could call him every morning and he sent a big bucked of hot water. the hospitality is amazing and his cousin made it his mission to show me around the city, and even invited me into his home. the only thing to mention is that the place is quite loud. the doorbell of the front gate is connected to the garage where the room is located, which can be very loud, so don’t forget your earplugs :) overall my stay was amazing and i would definitely recommend staying there!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Recommended for real travelers, you can experience the original taste of Old Dhaka from here, feel the history of Bangladesh culture, the location is good, almost all the attractions in Lao Dhaka can walk to.The host and his brother and relatives were very welcoming and took me out to Old Dhaka and gave me local traditional food.It is recommended to bring earplugs.The housekeeper will provide hot water in a bucket of hot water in the shower.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
The room itself is in a very good location. Right in the heart of dhaka. There are some restaurants and markets nearby as well as tourist attractions. Above all, you can enjoy the real life of Dhaka here. The room is clean and as described in the description. Fridge and AC are working well.
My stay here in dhaka was above all expectations, mainly because of the host. Imdy is an incredibly accommodating and frienly person. Always ready to help and explore the city together. I am sure that if I come back again I will book this room again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Imdy it’s a great host and if you want to experience the real Dhaka and the old Town you are at the right place. Imdy speaks very good English and he will take you places that many tourist wouldn’t go. Imdy also is a traveller himself and he knows what other travels expect and goes above and beyond to accommodate any enquiry that you may have.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Not bad not bad

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: We've been very comfortable. The accommodation is central, in a good area full of actions, good restaurants, and things to do and see. Also, Imdy is an excellent landlord. She helped us with everything, she fixed all the inconveniences quickly. He has become a good friend in Bangladesh whom we will visit again soon. Accommodation is simple but sufficient. It is a garage but with A/C, sink, double bed and security at the entrance. Overall a 10 if looking for something simple, cheap and real.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
The main reason this place is the best stay in Dhaka is definitely the host : Imdy. As a traveler himself he wanted us to have the best experience in his city and that's exactly what happened. Luckily for us, we where in Dhaka during Eid, so Imdy was available most of the time. He invited us to share meals with his family and they even made extra food for us as we are vegetarians. We had a great time hanging together, just talking on his balcony with cha or visiting Old Dhaka.
We couldn't have hoped for a better experience, thank again for everything 🙏
The room is also great, it's simple but has everything you need and even more.
It's very clean and has a fan and a net. Filtered water, but also towels and soap were provided.
It's located in the garage of the building with its own private entrance.

info: Rating, 1 star,  · March 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
This place is inside a car Garage! It is where gatekeepers and drivers usually stay! This place is absolutely not suitable for a single female or couples. Even local Bangladeshis would think twice before staying here!
The place was impossible to find. We spent almost two hours to find the place. We had local street people help us find the place.
The host did not respond to phone calls that he provided on the airbnb.
Beware before you book this place. Its a form of scam and airbnb needs to remove this posting!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Host Imdy has a lot of travel experiences in Asia and is designed to experience true landscapes and cultures like nature and locals, so it's great about entertaining guests from that traveler's perspective.English is also fluent and there is no problem with communication at all.The room is small, but there is also a shower (water only), and there is also a refrigerator and sofa to relax in.It's close to the old town, so if you want to get to know the deep ducks, it's so exciting and fun just walking through the surrounding alleys.I have also been to Japan, and it is very close to Japanese guests, so I highly recommend it for Japanese guests!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Great location if you want to experience being in Old Dhaka, not surprisingly can be a little noisy at times. Host and family were very responsive to needs.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The accommodation is great, super central and clean. Imdad, the host, is always aware that you are well and helps you in any way possible. I would definitely repeat here

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: I stayed here for about 20 days and it was a great experience.The room is great, the host is also very friendly. Although he is not in Bangladesh, he has always cared about my experience.His brother is a wonderful young man who went out to eat together and helped me get a taxi to the airport while I was away.I will be back in India this year and will definitely be staying again this year.Highly recommended.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022
rating_comment: It is a very nice place. Highly recommended. Safe and comfortable. They are always friendly..

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022
rating_comment: I was very comfortable during my stay, and they actively helped me. If I come to Dhaka again, I would like to visit again..

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
This is the perfect Airbnb for you to experience the authentic old Dhaka.
Since I am a Digital Nomad and Internet connection is very important, the host Imdad organized an Optic Fiber connection within a day.
Besided being super helpful Imdad is a traveller himself and it is super easy to connect with him since he is a very genuine and fun person.
We have been on multiple adventures all around the city and the riversides together. I can ensure you that here you will have a good time in old Dhaka!
The room is supplied with all necessities; private wash room, fridge and even a stove with utensils when you ask for.
Overall I am enjoying my stay, so that I have decided to extend my Visa and stay another month in old Dhaka.
If you have any doubt or questions, please feel free to contact me. Stay here! (:

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This is the only airbnb to stay if you are looking for a real taste of Dhaka. Staying with Imdy and his family is very comfortable and helpful, true Bangladeshi hospitality. The room is quite private with a private wash room, the only room on that side of the building ground floor, with very nice helpers too. Stay here!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: A host in a great tradition of Dhaka and Bangladeshi hospitality...Let Old Dhaka unfold in front of your eyes ..

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2021,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Room were clean, very comfortable, and the staff was amazing.They help make my stay completable. I highly recommend this place .

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: We stayed with two friends.Host Imdad's brother?Brother? My Imran (handsome) has taken care of me for taking care of me.English is very fluent and communicative without difficulty.This may be a coincidence, but the street food outside was dangerous, so they even served us.It seemed like a few Japanese people had stayed there before, and they were used to it.The room is also beautiful, and I can't believe that I stopped at this price in Bangla.Old Dhaka, which Japanese tourists would like to visit, is also within the Likisha area (20-30 Taka). Japanese accommodation is also good, but I think that the experience of taking care of the local people in Bangladesh is also good.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2020,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: There was no Imdad when I stayed, but his brother Imran took care of me. And he always cared for me. Everyone around him is also very kind. In addition, access to Old Dhaka is excellent, so I recommend that you stay here if you plan to go there. Earplugs are a must have as the noise is echoing outside for 24 hours.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Everything perfect!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Thinking of budget and location,this site can be a choice for solo tourist.u can enjoy old dhaka city walking.small room but new mattress, a few elc points,wifi works well.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Nice place, close to everything and very nice people.
